snippet.title: Towertale - PC Release Trailer
snippet.description:
Buy now on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/980480/Towertale/

Buy now on Itch:
https://misougames.itch.io/towertale

Towertale is a 2D, story-driven action game that has a heavy focus in boss battles. Fight your way up "The Tower" and challenge the bosses of each level. Unveil the mystery that lies up in its peak. Play four different stories and unlock multiple endings. Join Lionel, Faindrel, Lord Snickelfritz and "Dark Echo" in their quest to get to the top! 

For more information, visit our website: https://misougames.com/towertale 

Want to write about our game? Visit our presskit: https://www.misougames.com/presskit 
Follow us on Twitter: https://twitter.com/misougames 
Like us on facebook: https://facebook.com/misougames
